answers.answer: Oh he also wees alot. He wets the bed everynite and if u wait longer then 3hrs to change his nappy during the day we have to change his clothes.
Oh and he will eat anything. from seafood to fruitand more he has not turned away anything yet...
Have you thought about Prade WIllie Syndrome or had him tested fro diabetes?I would ask your ped if you can be referred to a geneticist.

question: My son was born 3.2kg's. He is now 7monthes and is over 16kg's. during my pregnancey i couldnt eat and struggled with 1meal a day. My baby is a good eater but doesnt drink to much then normal. I give him water with his solids. he has only just started sleeping thru the nite. A lot of people tell me i must be over feeding him for him to be so big. he's now almost outgrown size 3 (which really should fit a 3year old) im 6'1in height and med build and my husband is 6'4 (hes also a maori from new zealand) and a large build we r very broard people. my son is also very long and has an over average size head, but it fits with his length n weight oh and he has very long feet. Could he have any underlying medical conditions which is making him grow so fast? I know babies r supposed to grow but he's grom from 5 o clothing to now almost a size 4 in 7 months, thats 7 sizes
title: I have a very health but big baby...
